title: Topic 001 Question 180
body: You have just created a new project which will be used to deploy a globally distributed application. You will use Cloud Spanner for data storage. You want to create a Cloud Spanner instance. You want to perform the first step in preparation of creating the instance. What should you do?
options: Configure your Cloud Spanner instance to be multi-regional.
Create a new VPC network with subnetworks in all desired regions.
Grant yourself the IAM role of Cloud Spanner Admin.
